message:
SYSTEM: OWS_HandsOnPresentation.pdf: Página 2
A pilgrim in St. James’ Way
(Camino de Santiago)
Diverse routes for pilgrims (almost DIY)
Self-emergent community of pilgrims
People that talk about their experiences during the way
People that join together in the joy of walking
Mobile users
People want to
Find interesting locations
Find community services
Provide information
speaker: SYSTEM
